text: Malta is a city in Montana, United States. It is the county seat of Phillips County. About 1,900 people lived there in 2020. One of the best preserved dinosaurs ever discovered was unearthed north of Malta in 2000."Mummified" Dinosaur Discovered In Montana The Great Plains Dinosaur Museum and Field Station is in Malta. The Little Rocky Mountains are south of the town. ==References== Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Malta, Montana
